general.database:
‚ö†Ô∏è **Limited Functionality** ‚ö†Ô∏è
No settings found, please contact the bot owner!
general.default: this server isn't set up yet. Use $1 or the dashboard to change the settings.
general.disclaimer:
I am a small bot with the purpose to easily link and search MediaWiki sites like Wikipedia and Fandom wikis. I show short descriptions and additional info about pages and am able to resolve redirects and follow interwiki links. $1 wrote me in JavaScript.

You can support me on Patreon:
general.experimental: **This feature is experimental! It is not guaranteed to work correctly and may be removed in the future.**
general.helpserver: For questions and problems please visit my support server:
general.limit:
üö® **Stop, you hit a limit!** üö®

$1, your message contained too many commands!
general.missingperm: I'm missing some permissions for this command:
general.patreon:
this is a Patreon only feature!
You can support me on Patreon to get access to this feature:
general.prefix: the prefix for this server is `$1`. You can change the prefix with `$1settings prefix`. For a list of all commands see `$1help`.
general.readonly: **the database is currently in read-only mode, you can't change any settings right now!**

help.admin: These commands can only be performed by administrators:
help.adminfooter: Administrators can also use the dashboard to change the bot settings:
help.all: So, you want to know what things I can do? Here is a list of all commands that I understand:
help.footer: If you got an unwanted response, you can react with üóëÔ∏è (`:wastebasket:`) to my message and I will delete it.

default.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching article in the wiki.

id.desc: I will answer with a link to the diff in the wiki.

name.desc: I will answer with a link to the last diff on the article in the wiki.

post.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching discussion post in the Fandom wiki.

thread.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching discussion thread in the Fandom wiki.

fandom.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching article in the named Fandom wiki: `https://<wiki>.fandom.com/`

gamepedia.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching article in the named Gamepedia wiki: `https://<wiki>.gamepedia.com/`

admin.desc: I will list all administrator commands.

command.desc: Wonder how a command works? Let me explain it to you!

default.desc: I will list all the commands that I understand.

link.desc: I will answer with a direct link to the article in the wiki.

template.desc: I will answer with a link to the article in the wiki.

bug.desc: I will answer with a link to the bug in the Minecraft bug tracker.

command.desc: I will answer with the syntax of the Minecraft command and a link to the article for the command in the Minecraft Wiki.

default.desc: I will answer with the syntax of the Minecraft command and a link to the article for the command in the Minecraft Wiki.

mwprojects.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching article in the named MediaWiki project. Example: `$1!!en.wikipedia.org Cookie`

overview.desc: I will show some information and statistics about the wiki.

page.desc: I will answer with a direct link to the article in the wiki.

active.desc: I will respond to all commands on this server again.

inactive.desc: I will ignore all commands on this server, except a few admin commands.

random.desc: I will answer with a link to a random page in the wiki.

add.desc: I will add a new recent changes webhook.

default.desc: I will change the recent changes webhook.

delete.desc: I will delete the recent changes webhook.

display.desc: I will change the display mode for the recent changes webhook.

feeds.desc: I will toggle discussions changes on a Fandom wiki for the recent changes webhook.

lang.desc: I will change the language for the recent changes webhook.

wiki.desc: I will change the wiki for the recent changes webhook.

search.desc: I will answer with a direct link to the search page for the article in the wiki.

channel.desc: I will change the overwrites for the current channel.

default.desc: I will change the settings for this server.

inline.desc: I will toggle inline commands for this server.

lang.desc: I will change the language for this server.

prefix.desc: I will change the prefix for this server.

role.desc: I will change the minimal required role to use commands for this server.

wiki.desc: I will change the default wiki for this server.

test.desc: If I'm active, I'll answer! Otherwise not.

user.desc: I will show some information about the user.

accountage.desc: I will change the minimal account age (in days) for the wiki verification.

add.desc: I will add a new wiki verification. Accepts a `|` separated list.

channel.desc: I will change the channel for the wiki verification. Accepts a `|` separated list.

default.desc: I will change the wiki verifications used by the `$1verify` command.

delete.desc: I will delete the wiki verification.

editcount.desc: I will change the minimal edit count for the wiki verification.

postcount.desc:
I will change the minimal discussions post count for the wiki verification.
	‚Ä¢ Provide a negative number to require either the edit or the post count.
	‚Ä¢ Provide `null` to check for the combined edit and post count.

rename.desc: I will change if the user's Discord nickname should be changed to their wiki username for the wiki verification.

role.desc: I will change the role for the wiki verification. Accepts a `|` separated list.

usergroup.desc:
I will change the user group for the wiki verification. Accepts a `|` separated list.
	‚Ä¢ Provide `AND` as the first list entry to make all provided user groups required.

verify.desc: Use this command to verify your Discord account with your wiki account and get roles matching your wiki account.

voice.desc: I try to give everyone in a voice channel a specific role.

wikia.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching article in the named Wikia wiki: `https://<wiki>.wikia.org/`

help.noadmin: you need the `Manage Server` permission for these commands!
help.pause:
**I'm currently paused on this server!**
Only these commands can be performed:

dashboard.updated: $1 updated the slash command permission overwrites for `$2`.

interaction.inline: Please provide some text with [[wikitext]] links to use this command.
interaction.verify: Please provide your wiki username to use this command to verify your Discord account with your wiki account and get roles matching your wiki account.

invite.bot: Use this link to invite me to another server:

overview.readonly: This wiki is currently in read-only mode!

pause.off: I'm no longer paused on this server and will respond to all commands again!
pause.on: I'm now paused on this server and will ignore most commands!

rcscript.ad: You want recent changes directly in Discord? Use `$1rcscript` to add a recent changes webhook based on **$2** to your Discord server!

rcscript.all_inactive: you can't have wiki changes and feeds based changes disabled at the same time.
rcscript.blocked: this wiki has been blocked from being added as a recent changes webhook!
rcscript.blocked_reason: this wiki has been blocked from being added as a recent changes webhook for `$1`!

rcscript.enabled_feeds: the feeds based changes, like discussions, message walls and article comments, for this webhook have been enabled.
